description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Graphics Component Remote Code Execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-38051), apply the appropriate updates as detailed below:

1. Identify the correct KB update based on your Windows version.
2. Download and install the relevant update package:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64): [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - For Windows 10 (32-bit): [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)
   - Additional updates as noted for other builds.

**Details**:
This update resolves a critical heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability which could lead to remote code execution. Ensure all applicable updates are applied to maintain system security.

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that your system matches one of the specified build numbers.
- Backup your data before initiating the update process.
